messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Homeschooling on Dr. Phil
messages.msgSnippet: I think it will likely be on next week.  If you really want to see/tape it, then you can check back at the website every Monday to see what s coming up that
messages.messageBody:
I think it will likely be on next week. If you really want to see/tape it, then you can check back at the website every Monday to see what's coming up that week.

The Mom in the unschooling family posted about it in greater detail at Shine. I don't know if she's on this list or any others, but I'll mention at Shine that folks here are interested in knowing what happened. Maybe she'll post about here.

Sylvia

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Homeschooling on Dr. Phil
messages.msgSnippet: I sent that without checking.  it was from another homeschooling list.  I guess we will have to watch the listing as to when it will be on.  Maybe they would
messages.messageBody:
I sent that without checking. it was from another homeschooling list. I guess we will have to watch the listing as to when it will be on. Maybe they would retape if there was enough controversy.

Amanda

Carol <carolannette@...> wrote: I'm confused! The Dr. Phil site doesn't have anything about homeschooling listed this week. The site lists "New Orleans Scam?" as the topic for the October 27, 2006 show.

~Carol

Amanda
